task.title: Customizing Breaks
task.shortdesc: How to set up custom breaks in BreakBuddy.

taskbody.context: These steps show you how to set up custom breaks to tailor BreakBuddy to your preferences.

step.cmd: Open the Customize Breaks tab from the main dashboard.
Select your preferred types of breaks (Stretch Ideas or Music Breaks).
Enable one or both types of breaks.
